summary: Armor With Style!! For reference look up the mod Elaborate Steel Plate.
descriptionHtml:
Ver. 2.0.B = Final? or Encore? That remains to be seen...

This is the fully functional full working version of this mod, thus obviously making it the final version. For now anyway. Still might add a new armor or change the mesh a little, but not many have demanded or suggested it. As this mod gets more popular I may do more, but right now I feel a little undermotivated and think I need a break. So I won\'t do any changes until there is more popular demand and *AT LEAST* 12 endorsements, (By that time I will have had a significant break, by calculation anyway) remember, endorsements and positive comments motivate modders more, thus makeing modders (and me) want to do more. I will however still do work without endorsements, I just feel more motivated with those. I am putting up a Brainstorming/Suggestion topic along with a popular demand topic. The Brainstorming/suggestion Topic is for giving me ideas, tips, and etc. for this and other mods while the Popular Demand Topic is for you guys telling me where you want to see this mod go next, basically it\'s to organize who wants what and how many want \"this.\" Please comment, share ideas, and ask for what you want. It not only helps me and the community, but essentially yourselves as well. We can\'t read your mind and get you what you want unless you tell us. Until then keep up the slaying... WITH STYLE!!

*UPDATE*
to update to Version 2.0 make sure you delete EVERYTHING this file was associated with, then re-download.

NEW IN V. 2.0

Whole separate crafting system for GOD ARMOR VERSION!
Fixed the texture bugs.
THREE DIFFERENT TYPES OF THE SAME ARMOR NOW!!!!
   -Elaborate = Steel Plate
   -Elegant = Above Daedric
   -Graceful = GOD ARMOR
WARNING: GOD ARMOR IS INSANELY BUFFED AND AWESOME.  THIS AWESOMENESS IS NOT FOR EVERYONE. THOSE WHO PREFER TO STICK TO BASE GAMEPLAY SHOULD STEER CLEAR OF IT.


     This mod puts the Elaborate Steel Plate Textures on the Steel Plate Armor as a Non-Replacer, Craft-able/Upgradeable armor. These Armor\'s allow you to slay whatever you want in STYLE!!
author: Airahn
